code: export var SEND_OTP='SEND_OTP';export var SEND_OTP_SUCCESS='SEND_OTP_SUCCESS';export var SEND_OTP_FAIL='SEND_OTP_FAIL';export var SEND_OTP_RESET='SEND_OTP_RESET';export var sendOtp=function sendOtp(params){return{type:SEND_OTP,params:params};};export var sendOtpSuccess=function sendOtpSuccess(response){return{type:SEND_OTP_SUCCESS,response:response};};export var sendOtpFail=function sendOtpFail(response){return{type:SEND_OTP_FAIL,response:response};};export var sendOtpReset=function sendOtpReset(){return{type:SEND_OTP_RESET};};
